name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide Google Ads - block ads on Google search

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides sponsored ads on Google search result pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enjoy a cleaner, ad-free Google search experience with our lightweight extension!

Key Features:
- Automatically hides sponsored content and advertisements on Google search result pages
- Improves focus on organic search results
- No data collection or tracking – your privacy is respected

How it works:
This extension scans Google search result pages for sponsored content and advertisements, then hides them from view, providing you with a clutter-free search experience.

Privacy-Focused:
We do not collect, store, or transmit any of your personal information or browsing data. All operations are performed locally in your browser.

Enhance your search experience today – install "Hide Google Ads" and focus on the results that matter!
After installing the extension, make sure to refresh the page.

Note: This extension is not affiliated with or endorsed by Google.
